name: Corona
tagline: A base theme developed for the Office of Design's Wordpress projects
body:
# Documentation

## General Markup Structure

See the [Visual Markup Guide](https://iip-design.github.io/corona/markup/) to see how Corona's markup is structured.

The markup structure was heavily influenced by the [Genesis Framework](http://my.studiopress.com/themes/genesis/), and the Visual Markup Guide is forked from [Nathan Rice](http://www.nathanrice.net)'s invaluable [Genesis Visual Markup Guide](http://www.genesisframework.com/markup.php). It has been updated to reflect the changes we've made to Genesis' markup structure.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
